title: Dynamic Row Level Security in Power BI with NOT IN or NOT EQUAL Rule
excerpt: Sometimes when you apply the dynamic row-level security, you want to have the criteria as NOT EQUAL and NOT IN. This can be a bit tricky in the dynamic implementation of RLS because the relationship behavior is normally the opposite. In this video, Iâ€™ll explain how you can do that. Download the file
